issue.title: [C++] Improve error message on unsupported cast types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9478](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9478). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the error message when trying an unsupported cast looks like this:
```Java

No cast function available to cast to dictionary<values=string, indices=int32, ordered=0>
```

It would be more informative if the source type was also mentioned.
